revised_title: Reply to Dr. Daubeny's Note on the Air Disengaged from the Sea over the Site of the Recent Volcano in the Mediterranean
tldr: John Davy responds to Dr. Daubeny's objections regarding the origin of air disengaged from the sea over a recent Mediterranean volcano. Davy argues that the air is derived from sea water, rather than being of volcanic origin, and presents additional evidence to support his view.
